wlsxMonMIB.name: wlsxMonMIB
wlsxMonMIB.contactinfo: Postal: 1322 Crossman Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: dl-support@arubanetworks.com Phone: +1 408 227 4500
wlsxMonMIB.description: This MIB module defines MIB objects which provide information about the Monitored Access Points.

wlsxMonAPStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPStatsTable
wlsxMonAPStatsTable.description: This Table lists the statistics of all the APs being monitored by the controller.

monPhyAddress.name: monPhyAddress
monPhyAddress.description: MAC address of the air monitor that is monitoring the AP.

monRadioNumber.name: monRadioNumber
monRadioNumber.description: Radio number of the air monitor that is monitoring the AP.

monitoredApBSSID.name: monitoredApBSSID
monitoredApBSSID.description: BSSID of the access point being monitored.

monPhyType.name: monPhyType
monPhyType.description: PHY type of the access point being monitored.

monAPCurrentChannel.name: monAPCurrentChannel
monAPCurrentChannel.description: Channel the monitored AP is using.

monAPNumClients.name: monAPNumClients
monAPNumClients.description: Number of clients associated to this monitored AP.

monAPTxPkts.name: monAPTxPkts
monAPTxPkts.description: The number of packets transmitted by this monitored AP.

monAPTxBytes.name: monAPTxBytes
monAPTxBytes.description: The number of bytes transmitted by this monitored AP.

monAPRxPkts.name: monAPRxPkts
monAPRxPkts.description: The number of packets received by this monitored AP.

monAPRxBytes.name: monAPRxBytes
monAPRxBytes.description: The number of bytes received by this monitored AP.

monAPTxDeauthentications.name: monAPTxDeauthentications
monAPTxDeauthentications.description: The number of deauthentications transmitted by this monitored AP.

monAPRxDeauthentications.name: monAPRxDeauthentications
monAPRxDeauthentications.description: The number of deauthentications received by this monitored AP.

monAPChannelThroughput.name: monAPChannelThroughput
monAPChannelThroughput.description: The throughput achieved on this channel by this monitored AP.

monAPFrameRetryRate.name: monAPFrameRetryRate
monAPFrameRetryRate.description: The number of retry packets as a percentage of the total packets transmitted and received by this monitored AP

monAPFrameLowSpeedRate.name: monAPFrameLowSpeedRate
monAPFrameLowSpeedRate.description: The number of low data rate (<= 18Mbps for A/G bands and <=2Mbps for B band) packets as a percentage of the total packets transmitted and received by this monitored AP

monAPFrameNonUnicastRate.name: monAPFrameNonUnicastRate
monAPFrameNonUnicastRate.description: The multicast rate on this monitored AP.

monAPFrameFragmentationRate.name: monAPFrameFragmentationRate
monAPFrameFragmentationRate.description: The number of fragments as a percentage of the total packets transmitted by this monitored AP.

monAPFrameBandwidthRate.name: monAPFrameBandwidthRate
monAPFrameBandwidthRate.description: The bandwidth of this monitored AP in Kbps.

monAPFrameRetryErrorRate.name: monAPFrameRetryErrorRate
monAPFrameRetryErrorRate.description: The number of error packets as a percentage of the total packets received on this monitored AP.

monAPChannelErrorRate.name: monAPChannelErrorRate
monAPChannelErrorRate.description: The number of error packets as a percentage of the total packets received on the current channel.

monAPESSID.name: monAPESSID
monAPESSID.description: ESSID of the access point being monitored.

monAPRSSI.name: monAPRSSI
monAPRSSI.description: SNR of the access point being monitored.

monAPFrameReceiveErrorRate.name: monAPFrameReceiveErrorRate
monAPFrameReceiveErrorRate.description: The number of error packets as a percentage of the total packets received on this monitored AP.

wlsxMonAPRateStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPRateStatsTable
wlsxMonAPRateStatsTable.description: This table contains all the monitored AP Packet and Byte Counts but represented in terms of rate categories.

wlsxMonAPRateStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonAPRateStatsEntry
wlsxMonAPRateStatsEntry.description: Data rate based packet and byte count entry for a monitored AP

monAPStatsTotPktsAt1Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt1Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt1Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 1Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt1Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt1Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt1Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 1Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt2Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt2Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt2Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 2Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt2Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt2Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt2Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 2Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt5Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt5Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt5Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 5Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt5Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt5Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt5Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 5Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt11Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt11Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt11Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 11Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt11Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt11Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt11Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 11Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt6Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt6Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt6Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 6Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt6Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt6Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt6Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 6Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt12Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt12Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt12Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 12Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt12Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt12Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt12Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 12Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt18Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt18Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt18Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 18Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt18Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt18Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt18Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 18Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt24Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt24Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt24Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 24Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt24Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt24Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt24Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 24Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt36Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt36Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt36Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 36Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt36Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt36Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt36Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 36Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt48Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt48Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt48Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 48Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt48Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt48Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt48Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 48Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt54Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt54Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt54Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 54Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt54Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt54Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt54Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 54Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotPktsAt9Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotPktsAt9Mbps
monAPStatsTotPktsAt9Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets observed from this BSSID at 9Mbps rate.

monAPStatsTotBytesAt9Mbps.name: monAPStatsTotBytesAt9Mbps
monAPStatsTotBytesAt9Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Bytes observed from this BSSID at 9Mbps rate.

wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsTable
wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsTable.description: This table contains all the per BSSID Packet and Byte Counts but broken down in terms of Destination Address Type.

wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsEntry
wlsxMonAPDATypeStatsEntry.description: Destination Address based packet and byte count entry for a monitored AP

monAPStatsTotDABroadcastPkts.name: monAPStatsTotDABroadcastPkts
monAPStatsTotDABroadcastPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Broadcast packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDABroadcastBytes.name: monAPStatsTotDABroadcastBytes
monAPStatsTotDABroadcastBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Broadcast Bytes observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDAMulticastPkts.name: monAPStatsTotDAMulticastPkts
monAPStatsTotDAMulticastPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Multicast packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDAMulticastBytes.name: monAPStatsTotDAMulticastBytes
monAPStatsTotDAMulticastBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Multicast Bytes observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDAUnicastPkts.name: monAPStatsTotDAUnicastPkts
monAPStatsTotDAUnicastPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Unicast packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDAUnicastBytes.name: monAPStatsTotDAUnicastBytes
monAPStatsTotDAUnicastBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Unicast Bytes observed from this BSSID.

wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsTable
wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsTable.description: This table contains all the per BSSID Packet and Byte Counts but broken down into different Frame Types.

wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsEntry
wlsxMonAPFrameTypeStatsEntry.description: Frame Type based packet and byte count entry for a monitored AP

monAPStatsTotMgmtPkts.name: monAPStatsTotMgmtPkts
monAPStatsTotMgmtPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Management packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotMgmtBytes.name: monAPStatsTotMgmtBytes
monAPStatsTotMgmtBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Management Bytes observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotCtrlPkts.name: monAPStatsTotCtrlPkts
monAPStatsTotCtrlPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Control packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotCtrlBytes.name: monAPStatsTotCtrlBytes
monAPStatsTotCtrlBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Control Bytes observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDataPkts.name: monAPStatsTotDataPkts
monAPStatsTotDataPkts.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Data packets observed from this BSSID.

monAPStatsTotDataBytes.name: monAPStatsTotDataBytes
monAPStatsTotDataBytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of Data Bytes observed from this BSSID.

wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsTable
wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsTable.description: This table contains all the per BSSID Packet and Byte Counts but broken down into different Packet Sizes.

wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsEntry
wlsxMonAPPktSizeStatsEntry.description: Packet Size based packet count entry for a BSSID

monAPStatsPkts63Bytes.name: monAPStatsPkts63Bytes
monAPStatsPkts63Bytes.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were less than 64 bytes long.

monAPStatsPkts64To127.name: monAPStatsPkts64To127
monAPStatsPkts64To127.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were between 64 and 127 bytes long.

monAPStatsPkts128To255.name: monAPStatsPkts128To255
monAPStatsPkts128To255.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were between 128 and 255 bytes long.

monAPStatsPkts256To511.name: monAPStatsPkts256To511
monAPStatsPkts256To511.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were between 256 and 511 bytes long.

monAPStatsPkts512To1023.name: monAPStatsPkts512To1023
monAPStatsPkts512To1023.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were between 512 and 1023 bytes long.

monAPStatsPkts1024To1518.name: monAPStatsPkts1024To1518
monAPStatsPkts1024To1518.description: This attribute indicates the total number of packets transmitted by the AP that were between 1024 and 1518 bytes long.

wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsTable.name: wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsTable
wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsTable.description: This table contains all the monitored AP Packet and Byte Counts but represented in terms of HT rate categories.

wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsEntry
wlsxMonAPHTRateStatsEntry.description: Data rate based packet and byte count entry for a monitored AP

monHTRate.name: monHTRate
monHTRate.description: The rate at which the counters apply

monAPStatsTotHTPkts.name: monAPStatsTotHTPkts
monAPStatsTotHTPkts.description: The total number of packets processed at the indicated rate

monAPStatsTotHTBytes.name: monAPStatsTotHTBytes
monAPStatsTotHTBytes.description: The total number of bytes processed at the indicated rate

wlsxMonStationStatsTable.name: wlsxMonStationStatsTable
wlsxMonStationStatsTable.description: This Table lists the statistics of all the wireless stations being monitored by an AP connected to this controller.

monitoredStaPhyAddress.name: monitoredStaPhyAddress
monitoredStaPhyAddress.description: MAC address of the monitored station

monStaChannelNum.name: monStaChannelNum
monStaChannelNum.description: The channel the station is currently using.

monStaTxPkts.name: monStaTxPkts
monStaTxPkts.description: The number of packets transmitted by this station.

monStaTxBytes.name: monStaTxBytes
monStaTxBytes.description: The number of bytes transmitted by this station.

monStaRxPkts.name: monStaRxPkts
monStaRxPkts.description: The number of packets received by this station.

monStaRxBytes.name: monStaRxBytes
monStaRxBytes.description: The number of bytes received by this station.

monStaTxBCastPkts.name: monStaTxBCastPkts
monStaTxBCastPkts.description: The number of broadcast packets transmitted by this station.

monStaTxBCastBytes.name: monStaTxBCastBytes
monStaTxBCastBytes.description: The number of broadcast bytes transmitted by this station.

monStaTxMCastPkts.name: monStaTxMCastPkts
monStaTxMCastPkts.description: The number of multicast packets transmitted by this station.

monStaTxMCastBytes.name: monStaTxMCastBytes
monStaTxMCastBytes.description: The number of multicast bytes transmitted by this station.

monStaDataPkts.name: monStaDataPkts
monStaDataPkts.description: The total number of Data packets transmitted by this station.

monStaCtrlPkts.name: monStaCtrlPkts
monStaCtrlPkts.description: The total number of Control packets transmitted by this station.

monStaNumAssocRequests.name: monStaNumAssocRequests
monStaNumAssocRequests.description: The number of Association requests transmitted by this station.

monStaNumAuthRequests.name: monStaNumAuthRequests
monStaNumAuthRequests.description: The number of Authentication requests transmitted by this station

monStaTxDeauthentications.name: monStaTxDeauthentications
monStaTxDeauthentications.description: The number of Deauthentication frames transmitted by this station.

monStaRxDeauthentications.name: monStaRxDeauthentications
monStaRxDeauthentications.description: The number of Deauthentication frames received by this station.

monStaFrameRetryRate.name: monStaFrameRetryRate
monStaFrameRetryRate.description: The number of retry packets as a percentage of the total packets transmitted and received by this station.

monStaFrameLowSpeedRate.name: monStaFrameLowSpeedRate
monStaFrameLowSpeedRate.description: The number of low data rate (<= 18Mbps for A/G bands and <=2Mbps for B band) packets as a percentage of the total packets transmitted and received by this station.

monStaFrameNonUnicastRate.name: monStaFrameNonUnicastRate
monStaFrameNonUnicastRate.description: The number of broadcast and multicast packets as a percentage of the total packets transmitted by this station.

monStaFrameFragmentationRate.name: monStaFrameFragmentationRate
monStaFrameFragmentationRate.description: The number of fragments as a percentage of the total packets transmitted by this station.

monStaFrameBandwidthRate.name: monStaFrameBandwidthRate
monStaFrameBandwidthRate.description: The bandwidth of this station in Kbps.

monStaFrameRetryErrorRate.name: monStaFrameRetryErrorRate
monStaFrameRetryErrorRate.description: The number of error packets as a percentage of the total packets received by this station.

monStaBSSID.name: monStaBSSID
monStaBSSID.description: BSSID of the station being monitored.

monStaESSID.name: monStaESSID
monStaESSID.description: ESSID of the station being monitored.

monStaPhyType.name: monStaPhyType
monStaPhyType.description: PHY type of the station being monitored.

monStaRSSI.name: monStaRSSI
monStaRSSI.description: SNR of the station being monitored.

monStaFrameReceiveErrorRate.name: monStaFrameReceiveErrorRate
monStaFrameReceiveErrorRate.description: The number of error packets as a percentage of the total packets received by this station.

wlsxMonStaRateStatsTable.name: wlsxMonStaRateStatsTable
wlsxMonStaRateStatsTable.description: This table contains all the Packet and Byte Counts for a monitored station represented in terms of rate categories.

wlsxMonStaRateStatsEntry.name: wlsxMonStaRateStatsEntry
wlsxMonStaRateStatsEntry.description: Data rate based packet and byte count entry for a monitored station

monStaTxPktsAt1Mbps.name: monStaTxPktsAt1Mbps
monStaTxPktsAt1Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the number of Packets Transmitted by the station at 1Mbps rate.

monStaTxBytesAt1Mbps.name: monStaTxBytesAt1Mbps
monStaTxBytesAt1Mbps.description: This attribute indicates the number of Octets transmitted by the station at 1Mbps rate.

wlsxMonAPInfoTable.name: wlsxMonAPInfoTable
wlsxMonAPInfoTable.description: This lists all of the Access Points being monitored by the controller.

monAPInfoPhyType.name: monAPInfoPhyType
monAPInfoPhyType.description: PHY type of the access point being monitored.

monAPInfoCurrentChannel.name: monAPInfoCurrentChannel
monAPInfoCurrentChannel.description: Channel the monitored AP is using.

monAPInfoClassification.name: monAPInfoClassification
monAPInfoClassification.description: This attribute indicates the type of the AP.

monAPInfoESSID.name: monAPInfoESSID
monAPInfoESSID.description: ESSID of the access point being monitored.

monAPInfoRSSI.name: monAPInfoRSSI
monAPInfoRSSI.description: SNR of the access point being monitored.

monAPInfoMonitorTime.name: monAPInfoMonitorTime
monAPInfoMonitorTime.description: This attribute indicates how long the access point has been monitored.

monAPInfoInactivityTime.name: monAPInfoInactivityTime
monAPInfoInactivityTime.description: This attribute indicates how long the access point has been inactive.

monAPInfoSnrSignalPkts.name: monAPInfoSnrSignalPkts
monAPInfoSnrSignalPkts.description: The Number of Signal Packets observed by the Monitoring AP during this sample time.

monAPInfoSnrSampleTime.name: monAPInfoSnrSampleTime
monAPInfoSnrSampleTime.description: The Sample Time in which SNR data was collected.

monAPInfoStatus.name: monAPInfoStatus
monAPInfoStatus.description: Indicates whether this AP is considered to be up or down.

monAPInfoConfidence.name: monAPInfoConfidence
monAPInfoConfidence.description: Indicates the confidence that a suspected rogue AP is in fact a rogue in terms of percentage.

monAPInfoMatchType.name: monAPInfoMatchType
monAPInfoMatchType.description: The method used to classify the AP as a rogue or suspected rogue AP.

monAPInfoMatchMethod.name: monAPInfoMatchMethod
monAPInfoMatchMethod.description: Indicates how the match occurred for rogue or suspect-rogue classification: an exact or +1 or -1 MAC match.

monAPInfoHTMode.name: monAPInfoHTMode
monAPInfoHTMode.description: Indicates the HT mode of the monitored AP, if any.

monAPInfoEncryptionType.name: monAPInfoEncryptionType
monAPInfoEncryptionType.description: Indicates the Encryption type of the monitored AP.

monAPInfoWPAUnicastCipher.name: monAPInfoWPAUnicastCipher
monAPInfoWPAUnicastCipher.description: Indicates the WPA/WPA2 unicast cipher supported by the monitored AP. If multiple ciphers are supported, the weakest will be indicated.

monAPInfoWPAAuthAlgorithm.name: monAPInfoWPAAuthAlgorithm
monAPInfoWPAAuthAlgorithm.description: Indicates the WPA/WPA2 authentication algorithm supported by the monitored AP. If multiple authentication algorithms are supported, the weakest will be indicated.

monAPInfoIBSS.name: monAPInfoIBSS
monAPInfoIBSS.description: Indicates if the monitored AP is part of an adhoc network.

wlsxMonStationInfoTable.name: wlsxMonStationInfoTable
wlsxMonStationInfoTable.description: This Table lists statistics of all the wireless stations being monitored.

monStaInfoChannelNum.name: monStaInfoChannelNum
monStaInfoChannelNum.description: The channel the station is currently using.

monStaInfoBSSID.name: monStaInfoBSSID
monStaInfoBSSID.description: BSSID of the station being monitored.

monStaInfoESSID.name: monStaInfoESSID
monStaInfoESSID.description: ESSID of the station being monitored.

monStaInfoPhyType.name: monStaInfoPhyType
monStaInfoPhyType.description: PHY type the station being monitored.

monStaInfoRSSI.name: monStaInfoRSSI
monStaInfoRSSI.description: SNR of the station being monitored.

monStaInfoMonitorTime.name: monStaInfoMonitorTime
monStaInfoMonitorTime.description: This attribute indicates how long the station has been monitored.

monStaInfoInactivityTime.name: monStaInfoInactivityTime
monStaInfoInactivityTime.description: This attribute indicates how long the station has been inactive.

monStaInfoSnrSignalPkts.name: monStaInfoSnrSignalPkts
monStaInfoSnrSignalPkts.description: The Number of Signal Packets observed by the Monitoring station during this sample time.

monStaInfoSnrSampleTime.name: monStaInfoSnrSampleTime
monStaInfoSnrSampleTime.description: The Sample Time in which SNR data was collected.

monStaInfoStatus.name: monStaInfoStatus
monStaInfoStatus.description: Indicates whether this station is considered up or down.

monStaInfoHTMode.name: monStaInfoHTMode
monStaInfoHTMode.description: Indicates the HT mode of the station, if any.

wlsxMonEventCountTable.name: wlsxMonEventCountTable
wlsxMonEventCountTable.description: This Table lists counts of Events generated by the APs.

wlsxMonStationHTRateStatsEntry.description: HT Data rate based packet and byte count entry for a monitored station

monStaTxHTBytes.description: The total number of bytes transmitted at the indicated rate
